content.question: An Internet user has a need to send private data to another user. Which of the following provides the most security when transmitting private data?

choices.label: Certifying the data with a Creative Commons license before sending it
Sending the data using a high-bandwidth connection
Sending the data using public-key encryption
Sending the data using redundant routing

content.answer: Sending the data using public-key encryption
